asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/cuisinart-reg-programmable-em-200-espresso-machine/1014725652?categoryId=12054
Programmable espresso maker allows you to easily program the machine for single or double espresso. With 15 bars of pressure, stainless steel nozzle, frothing cup and 64-ounce removable water tank, you'll be making cappuccinos and lattes like a pro. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
